channel.title: Comments on: An Appeal to Reason at 1537 South Wilton Pl.
channel.description: Blogging demolitions one building at a time.

item.title: By: Steven Rowe
item.dc:creator: Steven Rowe
item.description: Please save 1737 South Wilton Place! We need to save as much historic architectural in Los Angeles as we can to retain it’s Architectural Heritage
item.content:encoded:
Please save 1737 South Wilton Place!
We need to save as much historic architectural in Los Angeles as we can to retain it’s Architectural Heritage
